testcase.classname: Test the login functionality of OrangeHRM
testcase.name: Test the valid login - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given user is on login page.................................................passed When user enter standard_user and secret_sauce..............................passed And click on login button...................................................passed Then user should land on login page.........................................passed
